Alternative

If you work out how to use ADB on a computer or use an app such as LADB, you can achieve the same functionality this app provides by running \"adb shell settings put secure show_rotation_suggestions 0\" to disable the button. Or replace the 0 with a 1 to bring it back.

Note that both this app and the ADB method might fail to eradicate vendor-specific rotation buttons. Some vendors have their own toggles for this â”€ for example, in Samsung One UI you can tap the text below the auto-rotate button in the notification bar to access settings.

It\'s likely that you\'re either not rooted or haven\'t granted this app superuser privileges. Unfortunately, this app can\'t function otherwise. \nThis message won\'t show again until the app is restarted.
